title: Upcoming 1/1 - Near Tech Giants - Great Location - Charming Community
app_fee: $25 for each applicant over the age of 18
posting_body: Wanting a dazzling new home in the heart of the Silicon Valley?
Welcome Sandlewood, your bright new home in Sunnyvale ☀️
We currently have an upcoming availability for our lovely Unit 41 (pictured ABOVE)!
This spacious 686 sqft  One Bedroom One Bathroom apartment is available August 12th (8/12/22) and features a quaint balcony, plush carpet, and plenty of natural light.
Our ideal location on the threshold Sunnyvale and Cupertino perches us perfectly in the heart of the Silicon Valley, placing tech giants like Apple, Intel, Cisco, and Google right at our doorstep.
For our commuters looking for a quick trip, we are conveniently located near major highways 85, 101 and 280.
And the nearby shopping, public transport, and the Sunnyvale Community Center ensures that your needs are never too far away.
When you need a break from the hustle and bustle of the tech bubble, take a breather alongside our shimmering pool and relax.
Or find some shaded solace under the foliage of our lovely trees.
Ready to be dazzled by the California sunshine?
Come visit us and apply today!
